api_list.name: waist-hip-ratio/calculate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://digital-health-tools1.p.rapidapi.com/waist-hip-ratio/calculate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "digital-health-tools1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
